concept.title: New Marketing Cloud Users
concept.shortdesc: When a new Analytics user is created in the Marketing Cloud (marketing.adobe.com), he or she is automatically added to the New Marketing Cloud Users group. The New Marketing Cloud Users group has no privileges. After account creation, you must move users from this group to another Analytics group according to the privilege level you want assigned.

conbody.p: If a user attempts to launch marketing reports & analytics before he or she is added to a different group, an "Access for this account is unavailable" error is displayed.

To provision these users, see . After you add these users to a different group, we recommend removing these users from the New Marketing Cloud Users groups. This helps you keep track of which users have additional group access and which users still need to be provisioned.
